xml.episodeInfo:
FUTURAMA
Episode 315
I DATED A ROBOT
Eric Kaplan Dave, The Neutral Planet
xml.info: Opening Credits. Caption: No Humans Were Probed In The Making Of This Episode.
Planet Express: Lounge. The Scary Door opening credits roll.

Smith steps out into the road and is hit by a car. He wakes up in a casino in front of a one armed bandit. He pulls the lever and three bars come up. The machine spews coins out into his lap. He laughs.
xml.speak: ON TV A casino where I'm winning? That car must've killed me. I must be in heaven! A casino where I always win? That's boring. I must really be...in hell!
xml.info: A bearded man appears at his side.
xml.speak: ON TV No Mr Smith. You're not in heaven or hell. You're on an aeroplane.
xml.info: He pulls a curtain across. Smith looks out the window and sees a gremlin tearing up the plane's wing.
xml.speak: ON TV There's a gremlin destroying the plane! You've gotta believe me!
ON TV Why should I believe you? You're Hitler!
xml.info: He holds up a mirror. Smith's reflection is indeed that of Hitler.
xml.speak: ON TV No! Eva Braun! Help me!
xml.info: She takes of her facemask, revealing she is a human-fly. Smith screams. All of the Planet Express crew except Fry sit watching the TV.
xml.speak: Saw it comin'!
xml.info: Enter Fry.
xml.speak: I just saw something incredibly cool. A big floating ball that lit up with every colour of the rainbow, plus some new ones that were so beautiful I fell to my knees and cried.
Was it out in front of Discount Shoe Outlet?
Yeah.
They have a college kid wear that to attract customers.
Well I don't care if it was some dork in a costume. For one brief moment I felt the heartbeat of creation. And it was one with my own.
Big deal.
We all feel like that all the time. You don't hear us gassin' on about it.
How can you people be so blase? Here you are in the year 3000 or so, yet you just sit around like its the boring time I came from.
Boring? Wasn't that the period where they cracked the human genome and boy bands roamed the Earth?
Yeah. But now its the distant future. Why aren't we out doing everything I ever dreamed of?
Hey, you know what might be fun?
No. Why would I know that?
Let's take the rest of the morning off and take Fry to do everything he ever wanted to do.
(sexfully) Everything?
Except that.
xml.info: A huge space station orbits a big green planet. "Sal's Wrecking Co" is painted on the side.
Cut to: Sal's Wrecking Co. Sal straps Fry into a seat.
xml.speak: Sos your fantasy's always been to destroys a planet huh?
Yeah, what did they ever do for me?
xml.info: He aims a gun at the planet, fires and blows the planet to smitherenes. He laughs while the crew look on with blank expressions.
xml.speak: Wow, the most humdrum activities look almost exciting through your eyes. What should we do next?
I wanna see the edge of the universe!
Ooo! That sounds cool.
It's funny. You live in the universe, but you never do these things til somebody comes to visit.
xml.info: The Edge Of The Universe. The ship approaches a black/white boundary.

The ship cruises towards the edge of space and lands in a parking space. The crew get out and walk to a wall seperating space from the nothingness after it. Fry puts some money in some binoculars and looks through them. He sees a Planet Express from a parallel cowboy universe wave. Our crew wave back.
xml.speak: Far out! So, there's an infinite number of parallel universes?
No, just the two.
Oh, well, I'm sure that's enough.
I'm sick of parallel Bender lording his cowboy head over me! Let's move on to Fry's next fantasy.
xml.info: Jurassic Kiddie Park. Fry rides a Tyranosaurus Rex.
xml.speak: (shouting) Yeehah! Bow before your master, puny mortals! Whoo! Giddy-up! Ha ha! Woohoo! Whoopie!
xml.info: A mother and daughter look on.
xml.speak: Mommy, why is that man like that?
Don't look at him!
xml.info: Fry dismounts and hops over the wall to his friends.
xml.speak: That was fun. Let's give him a treat!
xml.info: He puts 5 cents in a Dino-Feed machine and gets a pig out of it. He holds it up to the dinosaur which walks over to it. The pig squeals.
xml.speak: Keep your palms flat.
xml.info: The dinosaur gobbles up the pig. Fry laughs.
xml.speak: The tongue tickles.
xml.info: He laughs some more. He pulls his arms down - but his hands aren't there.
Outside Hand Crafters. The crew leave the store. Fry's new hands have a slightly darker skin tone.
xml.speak: These new hands are great. I'm gonna break them in tonight.
Yes it's been quite an hour and a half.
I've only got two fantasies left: Be invisible in a chocolate factory and be romantically linked with a celebrity.
I could pound your head 'til you thinks that's what happened.
xml.info: He pulls an iron bar out of his chest cabinet.
xml.speak: OK.
Wait, hold on. It is actually possible to meet any celebrity you want.
It is?
Of course! You should read a blimp sometime.
xml.info: She points to a passing blimp advertising downloadable celebrities at nappster.com.
xml.speak: Download a celebrity from the internet? What part of that do I understand?
It's simple. You can download a celebrity's personality and appearance into a blank robot.
Hey, I have an idea. Let's do that!
xml.info: Planet Express: Farnsworth's Lab. Leela and Fry put on the net suits.
xml.speak: Onto the internet you go!
Oh and while you're there pick me up a few credit card numbers.
xml.info: Farnsworth logs Fry and Leela in.

Cut to: Internet Browser. Fry and Leela materialise outside pentagon.web, a top secret site which has just been hacked. They walk past oldtrek-vs-newtrek.web where two trekkies have an important debate.
xml.speak: No way! Kirk could kick Picard's ass!
Eh, at least Picard had the guts to admit he was bald!
You take that back!
xml.info: Fry and Leela come to eBay.
xml.speak: Ooo! eBay!
xml.info: Cut to: eBay. The Milky Way galaxy is up for sale.
xml.speak: Are there no further bids for this exquisite galaxy? Sold to the Being Of Inconceivable Horror.
xml.info: The Being Of Inconceivable Horror laughs.
xml.speak: Yes.
xml.info: The Being Of Inconceivable Horror laughs harder.
Cut to: Internet Browser.
xml.speak: So where's the celebrity dating place?
Let's search the web. Over there.
xml.info: Leela and Fry walk inside nappster.com.
Cut to: nappster.com.
xml.speak: Welcome to Nappster. Let's see what celebrities we've got in stock. Can I interest you in Gwyneth Paltrow?
Nah. I read in Newsweek that she drinks human blood.
Then uh, how about Cleopatra? Who's beauty destroyed mighty empires.
I'd prefer someone from the era of shaved underarms. Do you have anything with a more Lucy Liu feel to it?
Nah, nothing like that. Though we do have Lucy Liu. Only woman ever to be named People magazine's woman of the year twice. In 2003, and then again in 2063.
I'd like the 2003 model.
xml.info: An image of Lucy Liu appears.
Cut to: Planet Express: Farnsworth's Lab. Fry and Leela takes off their net helmets.
xml.speak: Wahoo! I've found her! What do I do now?
Download her. Let's just put a blank robot in the drive.
xml.info: He lifts a basic robot out of a box of ten and hands it to Fry. Fry puts it in the drive. Lucy Liu is downloaded from the net and she appears on the robot. Fry gasps.
xml.speak: It worked!
You're one sexy man (mechanical voice) Philip J. Fry!
xml.info: She leaps into his arms and kisses him. She pushes him to the floor.
xml.speak: (muffled) It worked perfectly!
xml.info: Time Lapse. Fry is still dumbstruck and he gazes at his Liubot with his mouth wide open.
xml.speak: Well, you downloaded Lucy Liu. Are you just going to stare vacantly at her and not say anything?
xml.info: Fry guffaws.
xml.speak: I find your slack-jawed stare very attractive (mechanical voice) Philip J. Fry.
Did you hear that? She likes me!
Well duh! She's programmed to like you!
But this is Lucy Liu! Perhaps the only good actress of the 21st century! She's more than just a piece of software.
Would you like to take a moment to register me?
Uh, not right now.
I'll remind you later you hot stud you!
So uh, what do you feel like doing?
Would you like to take a moment to register me?
I said later!
xml.info: Dinkin' Donuts. Fry and the Liubot are on a date. Fry is gobbling donuts.
xml.speak: Then when I feel so stuffed I can't eat anymore, I just use the restroom, and then I can eat more.
You should write a book Fry. People need to know about the (mechanical voice) can eat more.
Oh Lucy! You're just like I always thought you'd be from your movies.
My personality is mathematically derived from my movies, proportionally weighted by box office receipts.
xml.info: Fry stares blankly then bites into a donut.

Montage Fry and the Liubot date to Wham!'s Love Machine. First they drop steaks into the octopus tank at the Brooklyn Aquarium and the octopus eats it a wiggles it's tentacles around. Next Fry eats a hotdog while the Liubot runs down a street with him on her shoulders. In the Planet Express lounge Fry has a toy soldier war. He throws one at a fan and it richochets off in another direction. Liubot dives on Fry and pushes him under the table.
Time Lapse. Fry and Liubot are sat on the couch.
xml.speak: You're cute!
You're cute!
You!
You!
You!
You!
You!
xml.info: The rest of the crew watch in horror.
xml.speak: Oh dear! She's stuck in an infinite loop and he's an idiot. Well, that's love for you.
Humans dating robots is sick. You people wonder why I'm still single?? It's 'cause all the fun robot sisters are dating humans!
Bender, this is Fry's decision. And he made it wrong, so it's time for us to interfere in his life.
xml.info: Planet Express: Meeting Room. Leela breaks the news to Fry.
xml.speak: She doesn't really love you. She can't. She's just a machine that -
Well, so what if I love a robot? It's not hurting anybody.
My God! He never took middle school hygiene. He never saw the propaganda film.
It's just lucky I keep a copy in the VCR at all times!
xml.info: He presses a button and a film title appears on the screen: I Dated A Robot!. In the movie a couple sit in a caf� and stare into each other's eyes. A narrator walks into the scene.
xml.speak: IN MOVIE Ordinary human dating. It's enjoyable and it serves an important purpose. But when a human dates an artificial mate, there is no purpose. Only enjoyment. And that leads to...tragedy.
xml.info: The woman behind him turns into a blank robot and the man downloads a celebrity onto it.
xml.speak: IN MOVIE Neato! A Marylin Monroebot!
IN MOVIE Ooo! You're a real dreamboat (mechanical voice) Billy Everyteen!
IN MOVIE Harmless fun? Let's see what happens next!
xml.info: The scene cuts to Billy's bedroom. He is kissing the Monroebot. Enter his mother.
xml.speak: IN MOVIE No thank Mom, I'd rather make out with my Monroebot.
xml.info: Enter his dad.
xml.speak: IN MOVIE No thanks dad, I'd rather make out with my Monroebot.
xml.info: Enter his girlfriend, Mavis, from the caf�.
xml.speak: IN MOVIE Billy, do you want to come over tonight? We can make out together.
IN MOVIE Gee Mavis, your house is across the street, that's an awfully long way to go for making out.

IN MOVIE Did you notice what went wrong in that scene? Ordinarily Billy would work hard to make money from his paper route then he'd use the money to buy dinner for Mavis, thus earning the slim chance of performing the reproductive act. But in a world where teens can date robots why should he bother? Why should anyone bother? Let's take a look at Billy's planet a year later. Where are all the football stars? And where are the biochemists? They are trapped - trapped in a soft, vice-like grip of robot lips. All civilisation was just an effort to impress the opposite sex. And sometimes the same sex. Now, let's skip forward 80 years into the future. Where is Billy?
xml.info: The scene changes to a post-apocalyptic world. Billy is an aged man but he is still with his Monroebot and still making out with her.
xml.speak: IN MOVIE Farewell!
xml.info: He dies.
xml.speak: IN MOVIE The next day Billy's planet was destroyed by aliens. Have you guessed the name of Billy's planet? It was Earth. Don't Date Robots!
xml.info: A caption appears on the screen with the same words on it and the movie ends. The space pope is displayed on the screen with Crocodylus Pontiflex written around him in English and alien.
xml.speak: Did that make any impression on you Fry? Fry?
xml.info: She turns around. Fry and Liubot are making out. Liubot giggles.
xml.speak: Ooo!
xml.info: Farnsworth holds up another tape.
xml.speak: I knew I should have shown him Electro Gonhorrhea: The Noisy Killer.
xml.info: Planet Express: Lounge. Bender sits in a chair with his legs crosses holding a cigar. He puts on a weird voice as he speaks.
xml.speak: What is the world coming to? That Fry's a sicko pervert I tell you, dating a robot. It's an atrosmacy.
But Fry's our friend Bender.
Aww jeez would you stifle there meatbag?
You stifle Bender.
Hooray! Finally you're standing up to him.
Although he is completely right.
We've got to stem this tidal wave of moral decay. It's time to shut down nappster.com!
xml.info: Nappster HQ. Enter Bender, Leela and Zoidberg.
xml.speak: Who's in charge of this dump?
xml.info: Jeff Jervis CEO stands up.
xml.speak: That'd be me. If you're an investor you can dump your money in the hole there.
Listen you fat internet nerd.
Listening.
Your company promotes wrong love! If you don't shut down right now the only thing wired about you will be your jaw!
You can't shut us down. The internet is about the free exchange and sale of other people's ideas. We've done nothing wrong!
xml.info: Lucy Liu suddenly cries out from behind a door marked Authorized Personnel Only.
xml.speak: FROM ROOM Help! I'm being held prisoner!
Someone in trouble is!
No stay out! There's a guy going for the Tetris world record in there!
xml.info: He covers the door with himself and part of a sign covering the nappster sign falls away. Nappster is really kidnappster! Bender pushes Jervis out the way and he Leela and Zoidberg run in.
Cut to: Kidnappster HQ. The room is filled with heads in jars.
xml.speak: Who are you?
Don't hurt us!
Help me! They've been holding me prisoner for 800 years!
The real Lucy Liu! The one you can see a movie of in the popcorn stadium!
So what's your problem?
Those sweaty nerds are making illegal copies of us. (crying) It hurts!
xml.info: Jervis knocks on the door.
xml.speak: Its a bluff.
We can't take that chance. Move people move!
Please pick me up before you go go!
She asked first.
xml.info: She picks up Liu's jar and activates a pressure alarm. She replaces Liu's jar with that of Madeline Albright. Someone downloads her and she screams.
Cut to: Nerd's Bedroom. Albright is downloaded onto a blank robot. There is a table and candles in the room.
xml.speak: Uh, are you Lucy Liu?
xml.info: The Albrightbot sees the table and smiles.
xml.speak: Sure!
xml.info: Outside Nappster HQ. Bender, Leela and Zoidberg climb out of a window with Liu's head and run away.
Cut to: Nappster HQ. Jervis and another man watch them on the screen.
xml.speak: Oh we're doomed. They got the head, they uncovered the sign! Soon the whole world will learn we're cyber criminals! And we would have gotten away with it if it weren't for those meddling adults.
We'll stop them. They like Lucy Liu, we'll give them all the Lucy Liu they can handle! Hand me that backup disk.
xml.info: He puts the disk in the drive and changes the Liu-Mo-Tron setting to Erotic Assassin.
Cut to: Street.
xml.speak: Did you see me escaping? I was like -
xml.info: He woops.
xml.speak: Thanks for rescuing me, especially you Bender. (sexfully) Mmm, quite a masculine piece of metal aren't you?
Hey don't look at me like that. If you're thinking of crossing the line with Bender you can forget it. Bender don't bend that way.
Hey look its another Lucy Liubot.
(mechanical voice) I am Lucy Liu. Give me your spines.
xml.info: She leaps into the air and lands between the four.
xml.speak: Hey what the?
xml.info: She kicks him. She moves towards Bender and he backs away. She starts punching him.
xml.speak: (mechanical voice) Take this and that and one of these.
xml.info: She grabs him between her legs and slams him against the pavement.
xml.speak: Hey cut it out! I don't need this kind of publicity!
xml.info: The Liubot gets up and moves towards Leela. She kicks her in the face and trips her over. She gets up.
xml.speak: Alright Liu. Time to kick your frosty well toned ass! Heyya!
xml.info: She kicks her and the two get into a fight. Leela gains the upper hand and kicks the Liubot against a fire hydrant.
xml.speak: Then along came Bender!
xml.info: He turns the fire hydrant on and the Liubot starts to inflate.
xml.speak: Looks like you're retaining water.
xml.info: He snips it with his claws and it explodes. They cheer.
xml.speak: That was incredible Bender. You're like Jackie Chan before he got all doughy.
Aw shucks. I wasn't afraid of that robot. I'm pretty brave when you get past my macho exterior! It's an army of Lucy Lius!
xml.info: Leela and Zoidberg scream.
xml.speak: They're horrible!
xml.info: The Liubots start flipping over cars and kicking over mailboxes.
A Liubot throws a man through a window.
xml.speak: (mechanical voice) Robot Croucing Tiger.
(mechanical voice) Robot Crane style!
xml.info: Cut to: Newsstand. The Liubots chase people down the streets. Zapp Brannigan turns on the sexlexia.
xml.speak: Now that's a wave of destruction that's easy on the eyes.
xml.info: A Liubot grabs him by the throat.
She throws him across the street and he gets stuck between a sewer grate.
Loew's-N-Plex. Fry and his Liubot are at the cinema watching the 2007 classic Charlie's Angels III: The Legend Of Charlie's Gold.
xml.speak: This is the best movie I've ever seen. It has a vampire and an explosion!
It's amazing the way you (mechanical voice) notice two things.
IN MOVIE No! Don't open that coffin! It's ticking!
IN MOVIE I have to Alex. That coffin's not going to open itself!
xml.info: The coffin opens itself. A vampire sits up.
xml.speak: IN MOVIE Bleurgh!
xml.info: He explodes. Fry and Liubot are making out again. Enter Bender, Leela, Zoidberg and Lucy Liu.
xml.speak: Let's hide in here. It'll add to my box office gross!
Fry?
Aww, you guys came to watch me make out! That is so sweet. Wait a minute! Is that the head of who I think it's of?
Read the jar Evelyn Wood! Dr Z?
xml.info: Zoidberg clacks.
xml.speak: Fry, a herd of Lucy Liu are destroying the city. Is yours acting normally?
Let me see. Yep. Why do you ask?
IN MOVIE Mr Mayor, if you want to see a real vampire look in the mirror!
IN MOVIE I can't! I'm a vampire!
xml.info: Enter the Liubots via the screen. The audience screams. The Liubots knocks a few people over, rip up some chairs and batter people with them. One hits Zoidberg with a chair and he screams.
xml.speak: Why?
And Nappster says illegal copies never hurt anybody.
(SHOUTING) Quick, this way!
xml.info: They all run to the projector room. The Liubots follow.
Cut to: Corridor. Fry stops and so do the Liubots. He picks up a sign.
xml.speak: Sorry laides, employees only.
xml.info: A Liubot eats the sign. Fry screams and runs up the stairs. They run after him. He runs into the projector room and closes the door behind him.
Cut to: Projector Room.
xml.speak: Oh no. They're forming a human pyramid...of robots.
xml.info: The Liubots climb on each other.
xml.speak: Dammit! We weren't counting on them being as smart as they are sexy!
A dangerous mistake to make.
xml.info: Zoidberg presses a button and a door opens. A huge bag of popcorn is behind it.
xml.speak: At least we've got food.
Dr Zoidberg cut open that bag!
Hooray!
And don't eat it.
xml.info: Zoidberg sighs and cuts the bag. He is knocked over by the high pressure popcorn that shoots out from the bag. The popcorn flies out the window and knocks over the pyramid of Liubots.
The Liubots are completely submerged under popcorn. Everyone cheers.
xml.speak: Life was bad but now its good forever!
xml.info: The Liubots eat their way out of the popcorn and start firing it at the projector room. Everyone screams and ducks.
xml.speak: You'll be safe in here sweetheart. Get lost Pavorotti!
xml.info: He throws the head over his shoulder and puts Liu's head in.
xml.speak: Lucy Liubot, if I don't survive the corn I want you to know that I love you as much as a man can love a computerised image of gorgeous celebrity. Which it turns out is a lot.
Oh Fry, I love you more than the moon and the stars and the (mechanincal voice) poetic image number 37 not found.
xml.info: She stands up and the popcorn starts hitting her. She starts walking towards the projection window.
xml.speak: What are you doing darling? Get down!
xml.info: The Liubot points the projector at the other Liubots. They starts to swell up.
They explode. Fry's Liubot flickers on the floor.
xml.speak: You saved us. Are you alright?
Yes my love. I'll be just (mechanical voice) massive corn clog in port seven.
Are you the last copy of me?
Yes.
Erase her Fry.
What?? No!
Fry, when you downloaded her without my permission you stole my image. And in the end that's all I really have. That and the largest gold nugget in the world - one mile in diameter.
But I just downloaded her because I love you.
If you love the real Lucy Liu and not what you've seen in movies, genre stradling lawyer shows and kiss ass articles in People magazine, you'll blank out that robot.
xml.info: Fry starts to cry. The Liubot flickers.
xml.speak: I'm sorry. Hug me Liubot.
xml.info: She does. Fry reaches behind her hair and presses the erase button.
xml.speak: I'll always remember you Fry (mechanical voice) memory deleted.
xml.info: Her image flickers away just leaving a battered blank robot.
xml.speak: I know it hurts buddy. But at least you're not in a sick relationship with a robot anymore.
Uh huh. And I guess now maybe I can get to know the real Lucy Liu.
Pft! Yeah at our wedding!
It's true. Bender and I are in love.
But, but!
Don't be a prude Fry!
xml.info: He kisses Liu's jar while Fry looks on, eyes twitching.
THE END
